description: Welcome to Heritage on Hart! This stunning 3 level townhouse features 3 bedrooms up, including a master with custom walk-in, Extra large side bedrooms. Bedroom level laundry for added convenience!  Open concept main with high ceilings, premium finishes. Private landscaped yard, and 2 car garage with 30A EV charging, EXTRA visitor parkings right at doorstep. Quiet neighborhood with quick access to Lougheed Hwy, Hwy 1, Skytrain and transit. Golf course, Supermarkets and Shopping mall nearby. School catchment: Alderson Elementary, Ecole Maillard Middle, Centennial Secondary, French Immersion - Ecole Rochester Elementary, Ecole Maillard Middle and Ecole Dr. Charles Best Secondary.
